content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'artofs_artoadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [artofs_artoadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://artoadls.dfs.core.windows.net/artofs', 
	)
Go

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM SapVbapExtTable
GO
